title: The Powerpuff Girls
short_plot_summary: Three kindergarten-aged girls with superpowers fight crime and save their city from villains.
explanation: A pink heart, symbolizing Blossom, the pink Powerpuff girl who is the leader of the trio
A blue heart, representing Bubbles, the sweet and gentle blue Powerpuff girl
A green heart, symbolizing Buttercup, the tough and tomboyish green Powerpuff girl
A monkey, illustrating Mojo Jojo, the main antagonist and a recurring villain in the series
A brain, representing the intelligence and strategy used by the Powerpuff Girls and their enemies in their battles
